min.description: The minimum value (inclusive) that the block will start ticking after.
min.markdownDescription: The minimum value (inclusive) that the block will start ticking after.

max.description: The maximum value (inclusive) that the block will start ticking after.
max.markdownDescription: The maximum value (inclusive) that the block will start ticking after.

type.description:
[Block Action Type](../block_action_types.md).

Schedules a block to start ticking after a randomised interval between a min value and a max value.

Type ID: `apugli:schedule_tick`
type.markdownDescription:
[Block Action Type](../block_action_types.md).

Schedules a block to start ticking after a randomised interval between a min value and a max value.

Type ID: `apugli:schedule_tick`
